data.title: Reading the Fantastic Imagination: The Avatars of a Literary Genre 1443853879, 9781443853873

Part III: The Fantastic Imagination on Film

9 Lady and the Alien: Avatars of an Iconic Duo • Gabriela Glăvan

10 Subjectivity (Un)Plugged: The Matrix (1999) • Eliza Claudia Filimon

Part IV: Vampires and Machines

11 Out of This World:(Arch)Angels as the New Vampires? Nalini Singh’s Angels’ Blood • Andreea Şerban

12 Steampunk: Discovering Old and New Attractions • Andreea Verteş-Olteanu
